name: MIND BOGGLER
description:
THIS IS A PARKOUR GAME WHERE YOU HAVE TO COMPLETE LEVELS ONE BY ONE TO UNLOCK THE NEXT LEVEL.WATCH OUT FOR DIFFICULTIES!!

FEATURES - 

1- HIGH END GRAPHICS

2- 90 FPS SUPPORT IN MOST DEVICES

3- HIGHLY OPTIMIZED

4-10 LEVELS (MORE LEVELS WILL BE ADDED IN UPCOMING UPDATES)

5- REALISTIC PHYSICS

6- DYNAMIC TIME OF THE DAY IN EVERY LEVEL

7- FULLY OFFLINE. NO NEED OF INTERNET CONNECTION TO PLAY THE GAME

THIS GAME IS MADE IN PARTNERSHIP WITH KUNAL GUPTA WHO HELPED ME TO MAKE THE GAME

IF YOU HAVE ANY SUGGESTIONS, FEEL FREE TO MAIL ME AT pratham007talukdar@gmail.com.
